sys_remote_update_set.description:
This update set is the first in a the "Scheduled Survey app with UI Builder" series
Details on set up can be found in in post "# Taking creating a user input and creating a task with UI Builder" Creating a survey task from UI Builder user input"
sys_remote_update_set.name: Survey App: Creating a survey task

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="DELETE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Default">976a7c73c31b1210c1f7bb2ed401318a</macroponent><name>select_1/now_default/items</name><preset/><required_translations>[]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {TransformApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
function evaluateProperty({
    api,
    helpers
}) {
        return api.data.look_up_multiple_assessment_records.results.map((el) => {
            return {
                "id": el._row_data.uniqueValue,
                "label": el.name.displayValue
            };
        });
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-01-31 13:33:44</sys_created_on><sys_id>6545513fc39b1210c1f7bb2ed4013180</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>select_1/now_default/items</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Survey App" source="x_667457_surveys">22d6783fc3d71210c1f7bb2ed401315c</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Survey App">22d6783fc3d71210c1f7bb2ed401315c</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_6545513fc39b1210c1f7bb2ed4013180</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-02-01 10:25:47</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
